wordGroup: tainted milk 污染乳；异味乳

sentences.en: Bad corks get the rap for as much as 15 percent of tainted wine.
sentences.cn: 坏木塞被指造成多达15%的葡萄酒受污染。

sentences.en: The administration was tainted with scandal.
sentences.cn: 丑闻使得政府声名狼藉。

sentences.en: Opposition leaders said that the elections had been tainted by corruption.
sentences.cn: 反对派领导人说这些选举已被腐败玷污了。
